insert.foreach: INTO FAQ (FAQ_NO, FAQ_ASK, FAQ_ANSWER, FAQ_CATEGORYNUM, FAQ_USE) VALUES ((select nvl(max(FAQ_NO), 0)+1 + #{index} from FAQ),#{item.FAQ_ASK},#{item.FAQ_ANSWER},#{item.FAQ_CATEGORYNUM},#{item.FAQ_USE})
